entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 27 February 2023
